data.text:
What's happening this week at the UN? Major updates on the economy & development, a dialogue series on Africa, meetings on the protection of civilians in armed conflict & much more.

Full @UN_Spokesperson schedule is here: https://t.co/gQtGrsXc8H

Thank you to @AusAirForce and @NZAirForce for the gracious support that made @antonioguterres’ Pacific #ClimateAction visit possible.
See more from the trip: 
https://t.co/CklJhyd79g https://t.co/DH0Og8zLQB

"To save the Pacific is to save the whole planet.”

First-hand observations from @AntonioGuterres on the state of the climate emergency 

https://t.co/CklJhyd79g

Families are on the front lines of change when it comes to gender equality. @un_women has tips on how to inspire future feminists at home. #GlobalGoals
https://t.co/s3PnB5xKSh
Has your country made its contribution to this year's regular UN budget yet? See what countries are on the honour roll here: https://t.co/rcpgE6VH4Q https://t.co/glFSEfy9k5
A visit of both solidarity & gratitude – @antonioguterres travelled to New Zealand this week. Watch the highlights of his trip. https://t.co/aSBQPHGD2x

Thank you, Sir David Attenborough, for advocating for #ClimateAction and encouraging everyone to #BeatPlasticPollution. 
https://t.co/TGPLHsjYFA
Secretary-General António Guterres is calling on the world’s decision-makers to make enlightened choices on #climateaction because the whole planet is at stake. https://t.co/tmBZSvgqS0

These photos, taken this week when @antonioguterres was visiting Fiji, are a stark reminder of why it's urgent to take the #CleanSeas pledge. @UNEnvironment info is here: https://t.co/BX3YUyUI7n https://t.co/lgiQecip8F
Join @WHO and walk the talk from anywhere in the 🌍 on Sunday! You can 💃🏼, you can 🏃🏽, you can 🚴🏿‍♀️ - just keep moving for a healthier life!  https://t.co/4C6cBogu27 https://t.co/BmMVlp5Dez
At this market in Vanuatu supported by @UN_Women, @AntonioGuterres heard how these women are earning a living & support their families. https://t.co/HqTFhWo1ag https://t.co/MUHwHJV7jB

Around 50 million people worldwide suffer from dementia, with nearly 10 million new cases diagnosed annually. See new @WHO guidelines outlining how you can reduce your risk of cognitive decline: https://t.co/vpXAjH5T72 https://t.co/qGpi1FCHRg

.@antonioguterres received a warm, traditional welcome in Vanuatu, one of the most disaster-prone countries in the world. He saw first-hand how the Pacific island nation is facing threats with determined #ClimateAction.
https://t.co/gpaNjiIGKc https://t.co/VTgsTRSx4S

A 💨 and ☀️-powered boat!

In Fiji, @antonioguterres got to experience #ClimateAction live on board the innovative sustainable Uto ni Yalo vessel.

Here's what YOU can do, to protect our planet: https://t.co/zTkumwgS40 https://t.co/vUYNzQTEPD

UN peacekeepers from Germany leave their families behind and work in harsh conditions to protect some of the world's most vulnerable people. We thank them for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ  #ServingForPeace https://t.co/sURJnRtZgf

In Fiji, @antonioguterres met young climate activist Timoci. It's not Timoci's first time on the global stage. At age 12, he urged world leaders to take #ClimateAction. Look back here: https://t.co/tbbQadRG47

https://t.co/j3nEsQJvm1

The conflict in Yemen has resulted in a dramatic increase in child marriage, with the incidence of young girls being married off increasing threefold. @UNOCHA is trying to help. 
https://t.co/cHNegkfaj0

"We need urgent #ClimateAction to stop Tuvalu from sinking & the world from sinking with it." 

Looking out over the Pacific island nation, @antonioguterres saw first hand the extreme frontlines of the global climate emergency.  https://t.co/H7EnRXElsT https://t.co/MW046EtcWr
New Global Assessment Report on Disaster Risk Reduction from @UNISDR outlines steps for strengthening disaster resilience. https://t.co/PvCF7M1op5 #GAR2019 https://t.co/7vVkzCyqtA

"Nowhere have I seen the heartbreaking impacts of climate change more starkly than in this island nation" -- @antonioguterres about his visit to Tuvalu. https://t.co/H7EnRXElsT #ClimateAction 

 https://t.co/W6JMuro4qJ

Syria: @UNDPPA chief Rosemary DiCarlo & @UNReliefChief call on Security Council to unite in support of an immediate de-escalation of fighting around Idlib & work towards an enduring political solution. https://t.co/7EpOFtAOB2

"I met families whose homes & way of life are at risk because of relentless rising seas, which threaten to drown this beautiful country."

From the Pacific, @antonioguterres calls for urgent #ClimateAction: "We must save Tuvalu — and save the world." https://t.co/H7EnRXElsT https://t.co/5FHoyLkXsg
The pursuit of rights & choices for all, including sexual & reproductive health rights, remains #UnfinishedBusiness. More in this @UNFPA timeline: https://t.co/pOPJoThPi8 #StandUp4HumanRights

.@antonioguterres received a warm welcome in Tuvalu, where he saw first hand the very real impacts of climate change and called for urgent #ClimateAction.  https://t.co/H7EnRXElsT https://t.co/22o7aPRkvw

We must ensure that technologies are not used to incite violence, to fuel hatred, or to mislead the public, while harnessing technological advances for the common good. -- @antonioguterres on Friday's World Telecommunication & Information Society Day. https://t.co/Jn15dNYYlb https://t.co/oauJliwj9H

Equality means justice & protection for all people, everywhere! Join @free_equal and help ensure everyone can live their lives free of discrimination. https://t.co/wEAYVo5L0D #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/4Ur60RHEWl
📸: #FBF to last year's #Vesak celebration at UNHQ in NYC. Learn more, as people around the 🌍 celebrate the Day of the Full Moon. https://t.co/Zf5bJFng7T https://t.co/2GPQggvnpJ

Human rights are for everyone – no matter who you are or whom you love. Friday is International Day against Homophobia, Transphobia & Biphobia https://t.co/Ljui9GqDYQ #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/oLOa0PPVRh
Nearly 15% of babies worldwide are born with low birth weight, increasing the risk of serious, chronic health conditions in adulthood. @unicef has the latest data: https://t.co/n39IdoGveF

On Friday's World Telecommunication & Information Society Day, learn how @ITU's work helps improve lives and promote greater equality & fairness. https://t.co/ptXyNVecr8 #WTISD https://t.co/EwoCyV4Bre

This Stupa at UNHQ in NYC - a gift from @ThailandUN - stands for peace, goodwill, non-violence & compassion. Find out more as people around the 🌍 celebrate #Vesak: https://t.co/ZWfQ6FWoOO https://t.co/dFa3LoK8yX

On Friday's World Telecommunication & Information Society Day, we celebrate 50 years of @ITU's effort to help all countries benefit from information & communications technologies & achieve the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/uvC2xidLgQ #WTISD https://t.co/LjQwm6fDw1

"In a time of growing intolerance and inequality, the Buddha’s message of non-violence and service to others is more relevant than ever." -- @antonioguterres' message on #Vesak, the Day of the Full Moon. https://t.co/Zf5bJFng7T https://t.co/QjalPtXe5w

"Climate change is the battle of my life." 

From Fiji, @antonioguterres calls for stronger political will and urgent #ClimateAction. https://t.co/9CP4rvWVHw

 https://t.co/xySY8QDqj1

Germany provides military & police officers to 7 @UNPeacekeeping missions around the world. We thank these brave men & women for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z #ServingForPeace https://t.co/2LENtLyqVg

With the right policies and planning, hazards like storms and wildfires need not always lead to homelessness.

Latest from @UNISDR. https://t.co/G3p1zl5gk6 #GPDRR2019 #GP2019Geneva

"I count on your generation to make my generation start behaving properly." 

In Fiji, @antonioguterres met young activists like Timoci and encouraged them to keep up the pressure on leaders to take more ambitious #ClimateAction. https://t.co/Nvl0LyZDbA https://t.co/qL60EghEx3
On Thursday's International Day of Living Together in Peace, find out how the UN works to make the world a better place - today, and every day. https://t.co/xy7LTwEsHn https://t.co/K5XX6LJl2N

From medicine to communications, from science to art -- Thursday's Int'l Day of Light provides an opportunity to reflect on the multitude of ways light influences our daily lives. https://t.co/aIT9vEcelx https://t.co/hRlI0jqqls

These students in Fiji told @antonioguterres that they want the world to know they are calling for urgent #climateaction. 

You can make a difference, too. Here is how: https://t.co/ByuqaEBbfe https://t.co/RNVFqxPLKz

The UN promotes peace, tolerance, inclusion, understanding & solidarity around the 🌍 every day. More info on Thursday's Int'l Day of Living Together in Peace is here: https://t.co/zfygRvnjyq https://t.co/hoVXUQMw9P

Yemen remains very much at the crossroads between war and peace. 

For updates, including what was said in the Security Council Wednesday on Houthi withdrawal from three key Red Sea ports, follow @OSE_Yemen & see: https://t.co/4rjHKz3VBS https://t.co/L979jfadOF
Starting soon: Watch live as @antonioguterres talks #ClimateAction with @UniSouthPacific students in Fiji: https://t.co/Ndb2IuPI63 https://t.co/MnqmnSNBsm

After WWII, the UN was established to save succeeding generations from the scourge of war. 

Info on Thursday's Int'l Day of Living Together in Peace is here: https://t.co/xy7LTwmRiN https://t.co/LBlDNZ8jSl

Thursday's International Day of Light celebrates the role light plays in science, culture, art, education, & sustainable development. Find out more from @UNESCO: https://t.co/a97BoHfyRH #GlobalGoals https://t.co/UAsF85EuFg

Strengthening technological capabilities of developing countries is critical for achieving #GlobalGoals. New @UNCTAD framework presents ambitious vision for science, technology & innovation policy making. https://t.co/ItjUuQoIju https://t.co/mW6yHLxpL2

The UN is strongly committed to supporting your response to climate change & reversing negative trends that have put your cultures & very existence at risk. – @antonioguterres to Pacific Island Forum leaders in Fiji https://t.co/h6O2Tep8aQ #ClimateAction
https://t.co/kvsNm1jJoJ

Now online: Global Assessment Report on Disaster Risk Reduction on new and emerging risks. 

@UNISDR says governments need to build resilience to stay on track for the #GlobalGoals https://t.co/PvCF7M1op5 #GAR2019 #GP2019Geneva https://t.co/NznxMELP99

Bula! 

@antonioguterres received a traditional welcome in Fiji where he's seeing first-hand how Pacific island countries are taking transformative #ClimateAction. https://t.co/h6O2Tep8aQ https://t.co/uP6ZgfpUxv

Happy International #DayofFamilies! No matter how big or small your family may be, on Wednesday, let's celebrate the love, care, and support families can provide. https://t.co/ubzh3ERxKj https://t.co/6WpWyw7XPP

"The Pacific has a unique moral authority to speak out. It is time for the world to listen" – @antonioguterres stresses urgent need for #ClimateAction at Pacific Island Forum in Fiji https://t.co/lyw81vFihx

 https://t.co/GeLv2kjuAk

From jobs 🎣 & food 🍣 to health care ingredients 💊 & habitats 🌊, the world's oceans provide a lot of our resources. 

The Ocean Conference in June 2020 will focus on solutions to #SaveOurOcean. https://t.co/4WidMJ7pzk #GlobalGoals https://t.co/nA5LWa6ioG

Family means different things to different people – but at its core, family should mean love & support. Wednesday's Int’l #DayOfFamilies celebrates families of all forms https://t.co/kp3b8X7qlv https://t.co/2l0GpxLNVH
See what solutions were proposed at this week's #WaterConference2019 here: https://t.co/gemMfQjuRY #globalgoals https://t.co/lPz2zDb7ez
UN advisers alarmed by increasing number of religious attacks in Sri Lanka, issue warning that violence could escalate if not swiftly addressed. https://t.co/W7WBBUqil0

No matter how big or small your family may be, on Wednesday's International #DayofFamilies, let's celebrate the care, support & ❤️ families can provide. https://t.co/ubzh3F98BR https://t.co/l91oQxqgRJ

Watch: @antonioguterres carried his message of solidarity and tolerance to New Zealand, where he met with the Muslim community following the recent terror attacks in Christchurch.  

 https://t.co/8PMR0sB2q9

Technologies like artificial intelligence present significant opportunities for taking ambitious #climateaction, but also pose risks for deepening existing inequalities.  @ITU explains: https://t.co/jSShqRjtXj #GlobalGoals https://t.co/5fOa94bkSa

➡️ Exercise regularly 
➡️ Avoid smoking & harmful use of alcohol
➡️ Maintain a healthy diet 
New @WHO guidelines for reducing the risk of dementia are online: https://t.co/xjdMt18Vz1 https://t.co/kp5Q8r8cTd

Like so many around the world, @antonioguterres was moved by the poignant stories of compassion and grace from New Zealand after the recent terror attacks. Here's what he said in Christchurch this week. https://t.co/mOCcs7bHcp

Yemen update: Redeployment Coordination Committee Chair Lieutenant General Lollesgaard, visited today the ports of Hudaydah, Salif and Ras Issa to verify the redeployment of Ansar Allah (Houthi) forces. @ose_yemen info: https://t.co/4cYP6immvU https://t.co/MikktWGIQW

Senior job opening: the UN is looking for a recognized leader in strategic communications & media with a proven track record for success to lead the Dept. of Global Communications. Application details: https://t.co/RDwFO7cQ36 https://t.co/dQl91XfFhw
Drones are the latest tool being used by @WFP to help save time & money in humanitarian & development efforts in Ethiopia. https://t.co/b5MrEpUboU

"I am here to say with a full heart: You are not alone. The world is with you. The UN is with you. I am with you” – @antonioguterres tells Muslim community in Christchurch.

See more updates from his time in New Zealand on his new @instagram account: https://t.co/7RIBpRNgRI https://t.co/hjjsi9lWJo

All refugees deserve the chance to live a life of peace and dignity.

In Auckland, @antonioguterres heard directly from families who have been welcomed by New Zealand after fleeing conflict & persecution in their home countries. https://t.co/BANTWQKecX
News from Amman: @OSE_Yemen will meet the Yemeni parties on Tuesday to discuss implementation of the economic provisions of the Hudayda Agreement https://t.co/6NBJyQGfML

In Myanmar, @UschiMuller is meeting some of the almost one million people who need humanitarian assistance & protection due to ongoing crises. More @UNOCHA updates are here: https://t.co/CYRn7odcf9 https://t.co/5MUJDPkAvH

“Nature does not negotiate" – that's why @AntonioGuterres is calling for 4 key measures in order to be able to reach carbon neutrality by 2050 https://t.co/dsdPUZOdIE #ClimateAction
https://t.co/axj0Zzcpao
Don't just get angry when you see trash in the ocean & seas. There are simple actions you can take to help #beatplasticpollution. Here is how: https://t.co/ByuqaEBbfe https://t.co/6rlKRikNLw
How is @UN_Innovation working to foster change & harness technology for the #globalgoals? UN leaders share updates in this new video: https://t.co/Iy7pCe2Y8v #AccelerateSDGs https://t.co/6Fxb8Y19Gs
Learn to recognize the signs that someone may be in an abusive relationship. More from @UN_Women on how we can all help end violence against women. https://t.co/alyd4e9BVU https://t.co/rVxKJpc0Lp

Tax pollution not people.

Stop subsidies to fossil fuels. 

Stop building new coal plants by 2020. 

-- #ClimateAction message from @antonioguterres in the Pacific. https://t.co/DQzUro176V

This week in @UNGeneva: Innovators, eminent scientists & governments take part in Commission on Science and Technology for Development. Follow @UNCTAD & see: https://t.co/79m6M2YJ44 #UNCSTD https://t.co/8qcxw1cLRJ
Starts on Monday in @UNGeneva: Committee on the Rights of the Child, 81st Session. Info, documents and more: https://t.co/bXumOm96qn https://t.co/BBRJEOcLKw

This week in Paris: #WaterConference2019. Lack of water resources are increasing global pressure and triggering conflict between individuals. Follow @UNESCO & see: https://t.co/gemMfQB5Jw  #OceanDecade https://t.co/LkjU1GY8oA

"The green economy is the economy of the future and the grey economy has no future" -- @antonioguterres tells young people in New Zealand https://t.co/91ajOg4ZxT #ClimateAction https://t.co/EnS5YP6QAT
Starting now: @antonioguterres hears from students at @AUTuni about the issues that matter to them. Watch live here: https://t.co/IpLjlf8Shz https://t.co/nNubO1zKHm

NYC is marking #ILO100 in vivid colour: 5 beautiful murals now adorn buildings around UNHQ in New York to celebrate @ILO's 100th anniversary and the Organization's work for social justice. https://t.co/GxTaV7q6T8 https://t.co/K4YFCGCNqZ

To pay tribute to the extraordinary display of unity by the people and government of New Zealand, @antonioguterres has announced a solidarity Ramadan visit to Christchurch. 

See more here: https://t.co/z2BfZt2xRE

https://t.co/khLkzDMxAa

Violence, abuse & exploitation are some of the greatest risks women & girls face in humanitarian crises. @unocha & partners are working to prevent sexual & gender-based violence and to support survivors. https://t.co/loGHgP63Pj

@antonioguterres @jacindaardern @MFATgovtNZ @MFATinAuckland In New Zealand, @AntonioGuterres says the Pacific region has "the moral authority to tell the world that the world needs to abide by what the scientific community is telling us." #climateaction https://t.co/szLVYSRaej https://t.co/2DLvOjBfEL

This #MothersDay, @UN_Women shares 5 reasons for being grateful to moms everywhere. 
 
https://t.co/NR8ibZWSGI

"First of all, Happy #MothersDay" – @AntonioGuterres spent the day in Auckland with working mum @JacindaArdern, discussing #climateaction, the need to harness new technologies as a force for good & much more. See: https://t.co/szLVYSRaej https://t.co/LLlpmQQWrR

Kia ora! 🇳🇿 

@antonioguterres was welcomed to New Zealand with a traditional Maori ceremony. #UN4Indigenous https://t.co/DgWsJljP9i
Motherhood in adolescence is particularly challenging. See how @WFP is ensuring these young moms are able to meet their nutrition & socio-cultural needs. https://t.co/Jj7eXHAIhw #MothersDay
In Bangladesh, Rohingya women are taking on leadership roles within their communities & taking active steps to shape their futures. https://t.co/KUtOe6yDIF #WithRefugees

Mothers in Guatemala are using traditional recipes & ingredients to improve their children's diets and counter malnutrition. Find out how the UN is supporting them: https://t.co/Eh7pwuLKs5 #ZeroHunger #MothersDay https://t.co/zL0wseLhUP

Scroll through to meet the newest advocates for people, planet and prosperity. 

They'll be working around the world to raise awareness, inspire greater ambition & push for more action on the #GlobalGoals https://t.co/qr6FxrbEmD

Moms & children are at the heart of @WFP's work. On #MothersDay, and everyday, they ensure millions of vulnerable moms & their kids receive proper nutrition. https://t.co/1Xy24GskrU https://t.co/yA2b17ihVA

While 110,000+ people have been vaccinated against Ebola in Democratic Republic of Congo, new cases continue to rise, partly due to ongoing violence, causing @WHO to adapt vaccination strategy. https://t.co/sKTgXmdOmr

Plastic pollution poses serious risks to migratory birds. On Saturday's #WorldMigratoryBirdDay, see how you can take action to #BeatPlasticPollution, and protect these unique species. https://t.co/OhMv1hzqkR https://t.co/T3QR229Gc8
"I'm happy to be here to give you a first-hand look at my job & share what motivates me to strive for a better, more peaceful world." -- @antonioguterres is now on @Instagram: https://t.co/3aLQtVVJkU

Braving new human-made dangers every year, migratory birds continue to fly long distances to feed, breed & raise their young. 

More on Saturday's #WorldMigratoryBirdDay: https://t.co/UjrhBUz9zC https://t.co/P6eAxtCLCB
A new trust fund has been established by the UN to foster international cooperation on safe, orderly & regular migration. More: https://t.co/9IwXTuzUJ2 #ForMigration https://t.co/QhLJDySmH3

Quite a lot has changed in the last 25 years - but what about when it comes to motherhood? @UNFPA explores how being a mom today is different - or not: https://t.co/BaJWsv6daq #MothersDay https://t.co/y1Acoasiv0
On Saturday's #WorldMigratoryBirdDay, learn how you can help #BeatPlasticPollution to protect migratory birds around the world: https://t.co/OhMv1hzqkR https://t.co/JqEsO8McXY

Poaching continues to pose a threat to the long-term survival of the African elephant 🐘, according to @CITES. A century ago, an estimated 12 million elephants roamed Africa, now only 400,000 remain. https://t.co/4PWowxzNrS #WildForLife https://t.co/l6ijxqf0MY
Nearly 900 children held by an armed group in north-east Nigeria were released on Friday. @UNICEF & partners are helping released children through reintegration programs. https://t.co/ULGjCJBdAM

"When trade tensions rise, there are no winners, only losers, especially among developing countries."

At @WTO, @antonioguterres stresses importance of revitalizing multilateral trade cooperation to achieve #GlobalGoals https://t.co/LdVx7Y2PHP https://t.co/hsrHJakvGb

Despite limited space in the world's largest refugee camp in Bangladesh, with support from @WFP, these women manage to grow food to feed their families, while also earning an income. #ZeroHunger https://t.co/CDA2vpuU6G
